summary: The third installment of my \"Unmarked Places\" series of mods. This mod adds map markers to locations of dragon mounds across Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
~Unmarked Places - Dragon Mounds 1.0

~The third installment of my \"Unmarked Places\" series of mods. This mod adds map markers to locations of dragon mounds across Skyrim. 

~Installation
1. Extract the files to a temporary location
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary
3. Copy files to the Data folder in your Skyrim folder
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, then place a check mark \"Unmarked Places - Dragon Mounds.esp\"

~Uninstallation
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod:

a. Unmarked Places - Dragon Mounds.esp (File included in the downloaded folder)

~Incompatibility
This mod should not have any incompatibility issues. If anything is found, then please tell me on the comments!

~Known Issues or Bugs
None known. If any are found, please tell me on the comments!

~Change Log

None.

~LoganZezima 


See my other Unmarked Places mods here:


Player Homes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8339
Shrines: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8510
author: LoganZezima
